title: Trash Collector Devlog
content: We are currently in the early development phase of our potential debut Steam title, Trash Collector. This game is envisioned as a cozy, whimsical, and retro-themed trash collecting simulator offering numerous levels. Development began just over a month ago, placing the project in its very early stages. Upon achieving a sufficiently playable state, we intend to release a complimentary demo to engage a broad audience of gamers. We are actively seeking suggestions and new ideas to enhance the game.

title: Launching Our Official Website
content: We are proud to announce the imminent launch of our official website. Although not yet fully completed, this initiative represents a significant step forward for our presence. While itch.io has served as our primary platform for releases over the past several years, we are now transitioning to a dedicated online space. We have numerous ambitious plans and developments in store, and we encourage you to follow our journey.
